am_hal_crm.c File Reference

Clock and Reset Management (CRM) functionality implementation. More...

Detailed Description

Clock and Reset Management (CRM) functionality implementation.

#include <stdint.h>
#include <stdbool.h>
#include "am_mcu_apollo.h"
#include "am_hal_crm_private.h"
